Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.30654366]Coxsackie virus B5:inhibition of viral replication in Vero cells (60% inhibition at 10 µg/ml, 80% inhibition at 50 µg/ml, 87% inhibition at 100 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.30654366]30% cytotoxicity against Vero cells at the concentration of 100μg/ mL.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Antiviral Activity of Synthetic Peptides Derived from Physiological Proteins.
Literature.Author: Sala A, Ardizzoni A, Ciociola T, Magliani W, Conti S, Blasi E, Cermelli C
